runs.notes: Rest Day. Focus on hydration, nutrition, and sleep. Optional light mobility work or gentle yoga (15-20 mins).
Easy Run 10km at 6:30-7:00/km pace. Relaxed effort throughout. Warm-up: 5 min walk + dynamic stretches. Cool-down: 5 min easy jog + stretching.

Long Run 22km at 6:15-6:45/km pace. Even effort throughout. Water every 20-30 mins, energy gels at 8km and 16km. Comfortable endurance effort. Warm-up: 5-10 min easy jogging + dynamic stretches. Cool-down: 5-10 min walking + light stretching.
Rest Day. Focus on recovery from yesterday's long run. Optional light stretching, foam rolling (15-20 mins).
Easy Run 8km at 6:30-7:00/km pace. Recovery run, very relaxed effort. Warm-up: 5 min easy walking + light stretches. Cool-down: 5 min easy walking + light stretching.

Quality Session: Total 10km as follows: 2km warm-up, 4km at marathon pace (6:10-6:20/km), 2km at threshold pace (5:45-6:00/km), 2km cool-down. Practice marathon pace then add a threshold segment to build confidence. Warm-up: 10 min progressive jog + dynamic drills. Cool-down: 10 min easy jog + stretching.

Hilly Medium-Long Run 14km at 6:30-6:45/km on flats, effort-based on hills. Last substantial hill run before taper begins. Warm-up: 5 min easy jogging + mobility exercises. Cool-down: 5 min easy jog + stretching.
